outputs.output_descr:
The objective of this project is to support Ondo state ( located in the South- West) geopolitical region of Nigeria to strengthen the anti-corruption machnisms both internaly within government and externally- supporting Civil Society to demand for accountability. 
 Key outputs are: Strengthened leadership accountability and transparency; decentralization and local governance enhanced; increased implementation of public sector reforms and capacity building and e-governance (ICT for development) implemented

project_descr: Support to anti-corruption, accountability and public procurement reform in the public sector of Ondo State
project_title: Ondo State Governance and Human Rights Project
